&ltOBJECT>.ORDER_GET() Syntax Order_Expression as C = &ltOBJECT>.ORDER_GET() Description The &ltOBJECT>.ORDER_GET() method applies to:
Browses (for &ltOBJECT> use either the &ltBROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for &ltOBJECT> use either the &ltFORM> pointer or the name of the form) The &ltOBJECT>.ORDER_GET() method returns the current order expression for the form. Limitations Desktop applications only. Example dim ptr as P ptr = browse.view("CustomerBrowse") ? ptr.Order_get() ? "LASTNAME"
See Also Form Functions and Methods, Browse Functions and Methods
